from mmlspark.cognitive import *
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql.types import DoubleType, TimestampType
from pyspark.sql.functions import unix_timestamp


# Load the data into a Spark DataFrame
df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM default.anomaly_detector_testing_data") \
    .withColumn("DaysLate", col("DaysLate").cast(DoubleType())) \
    .withColumn("DueDateDT", unix_timestamp(col("DueDate"),'M/dd/yyyy').cast(TimestampType())) \
    .sort(col("DueDateDT"), ascending=True)
 

df.show(10)

anomalyDetector = (SimpleDetectAnomalies()
    .setLinkedService("pbifinance_anomolydetector")
    .setOutputCol("output")
    .setErrorCol("error")
    .setGranularity("monthly")
    .setTimestampCol("DueDate")
    .setValueCol("DaysLate")
    .setGroupbyCol("customerID")    )

results = anomalyDetector.transform(df)

# Show the results
display(results.select("DueDate", "DaysLate", "customerID", "output.*", "error").limit(10))
